chunks.content: This changed in 1924 with formal requirements developed for graduate degrees, including offering Doctorate (PhD) degrees.

metadata.relevance_reason: This sentence directly states the year when Doctorate degrees were first offered at Notre Dame.
metadata.answer_contribution: The year 1924 is the answer to the question regarding when Doctorate degrees were first granted.

required_info: year of first granting of Doctorate degrees at Notre Dame
